alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 11:29PM CDT until August 05 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NEMAHA...NORTHWESTERN RICHARDSON AND EASTERN PAWNEE COUNTIES... At 1129 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Stella to Humboldt to 3 miles east of Pawnee City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pawnee City, Humboldt, Table Rock, Stella, Du Bois, Dawson, The Highway 62 and 105 Junction, Howe, and Kirkmans Cove Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
